It has been recognized as a special city since 2005.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research (2011), Table 3 ; retrieved 2012-12-18. == History == Tottori Castle was established by Yamana Nobumichi in 1545. Tottori castle at jcastle.info ; retrieved 2013-2-21. The castle town grew at the base of the mountain where the castle was built. Tottori was incorporated as a city on October 1, 1889. The city was damaged by a great earthquake in 1942 and by a great fire in 1952. ==Related pages == * Gainare Tottori ==References== ==Other websites== * Tottori website ; * http://www.torican.jp/en/ ; Category:Cities in Tottori Prefecture
